publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3658 Anne McLaughlin: Palestinian Health Care Suffering—That the Parliament notes its extreme concern at findings in The Lancet medical journal, which describe Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza as suffering an "ailing landscape" of health services; notes that Birzeit University studies have shown that death rates among children and expectant mothers have failed to decline; finds it deplorable that 60 women have had to give birth at Israeli checkpoints with 36 of their babies dying as a result; calls on the United Kingdom and Scottish governments to exert influence to pressure the Israeli Government to allow in essential medical aid to help adequately equip Palestinian hospitals, and wishes the Justice4Palestine convoy carrying medicines from Glasgow well and a safe passage to the people of Gaza. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Bill Wilson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alasdair Allan*, Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*
S3M-3658 Palestinian Health Care Suffering (lodged on 10 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh Henry*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-3658 Palestinian Health Care Suffering (lodged on 10 March 2009) Dave Thompson*

S3M-3658 Anne McLaughlin: Palestinian Health Care Suffering—That the Parliament notes its extreme concern at findings in The Lancet medical journal, which describe Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza as suffering an "ailing landscape" of health services; notes that Birzeit University studies have shown that death rates among children and expectant mothers have failed to decline; finds it deplorable that 60 women have had to give birth at Israeli checkpoints with 36 of their babies dying as a result; calls on the United Kingdom and Scottish governments to exert influence to pressure the Israeli Government to allow in essential medical aid to help adequately equip Palestinian hospitals, and wishes the Justice4Palestine convoy carrying medicines from Glasgow well and a safe passage to the people of Gaza. Supported by: Aileen Campbell, Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Bill Wilson, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Alasdair Allan, Sandra White, Bill Kidd, Robin Harper, Jamie Hepburn, Hugh Henry, Joe FitzPatrick, Dave Thompson, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-3658 Palestinian Health Care Suffering (lodged on 10 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
S3M-3658 Palestinian Health Care Suffering (lodged on 10 March 2009) Angela Constance*
